channel.title: gdb on Tagore's Studio
channel.description: Recent content in gdb on Tagore's Studio

item.title: gdb 简记
item.description: 常用命令如下：（详情可以用 help 命令查看） r (run, restart) s (step into) n (next state, step over) finish (step out) q (quit) p (print anything you want) l (list) b (breakpoint) #设置断点： (gdb) b fileName.c:lineNumber 或者 (gdb) b function u (until) #运行到指定行 call #调用函数 set #设置变量 set args #设置main 的输入参数 bt (backtrace) #查看堆栈 x #examine memory, (gdb)/FMT ADDRESS info # show things, (gdb) info break d # delete somthing (gdb) delete break xx 或者 (gdb) clean lineNumber
